content: परिब(व)र्हः {@--1@} Retinue, train, attendants; इयं प्रचुरपरिबर्हया भवत्या संवर्ध्यतां <ls>Dk. 108.</ls> {@--2@} Furniture; परिवर्हवंति वेश्मानि <ls>R. 14. 15</ls> ‘rooms properly furnished or provided with furniture’. {@--3@} Royal insignia. {@--4@} The necessaries of life. {@--5@} Property, wealth.
